heroSubtitle: Professional painting and wallpapering in Tullinge and the entire Stockholm area
aboutText1: JTW Måleri is a local, family-owned painting company based in Tullinge, Stockholm.
aboutText2: With over 10 years of experience, we offer professional painting and wallpapering for both private individuals and companies.
aboutText3: We are known for our precision, high quality, and personal service – from first contact to finished result.
aboutText4: Our team uses only premium paints and materials for a durable and beautiful final result. We are fully insured and always provide a guarantee on our work.
servicesIntro: All work is eligible for ROT tax deduction.
service1: ✔ Interior painting of walls, ceilings and woodwork
service4: ✔ Painting of windows, doors and garage doors
contactIntro: Contact us for a free quote – we usually reply the same day!
area: Area: Tullinge, Huddinge, Botkyrka and the entire Stockholm county
